text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff... Teio... where are wegoing?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? Who's that running over there?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: El! Sh-she's really going for it...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, looks like El's revved up<n>today too! You two are in
the same<n>class, right?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hey, have you ever asked El why<n>she runs?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Why she runs? Well, no, not yet...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Raaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
She runs in order to prove that she's<n>"the world's
strongest racer"!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Not just in the Twinkle Series, either.<n>She wants to prove
her strength by<n>also winning races abroad.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: The world's strongest... So that's<n>why! El is incredible!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Tsk, tsk, tsk. El's not the only one,<n>you know?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hmph!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Grass is incredible too! Well, in her<n>case, maybe
"overwhelming" would<n>be more accurate.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Do you... know why Grass runs?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Haaa!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: The zenith!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
That's her goal, and what a great<n>goal for a racer to have.
Who cares if<n>it's simple?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: The world's strongest racer and "the<n>zenith"...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Haha! Told you those two are<n>amazing!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Still, "the world's strongest racer"<n>and "the zenith" won't
mean much<n>when I become the best Umamusume<n>to ever
exist.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
You know President Symboli Rudolf,<n>right? We all say she's
the best in<n>Tracen Academy!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to become like her and be<n>the best Umamusume
around. No<n>matter who I face, I won't lose.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: That's because I'm "the Invincible<n>Teio"!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Invincible... So that's your dream...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Well, yeah, right now, it's just a<n>dream. But we're students
of Tracen<n>Academy!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
If you find a trainer here, you'll be<n>able to race in the
Twinkle Series. And<n>on the racecourse is where our<n>
dreams lie!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Everyone here came to this academy<n>with a dream in their
heart. It's here,<n>and only here, that we can make<n>them
come true!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Make your dreams... come true!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
All right, then how about you and I get<n>started already? Up
for some partner<n>running, new girl?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Partner running... Wait, you mean<n>now?! Me and you?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, right now! Come on, no<n>dragging your feet! It's racing
time!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
By the way, what's your reason?<n>Why do you run?
What're you at<n>Tracen Academy for?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Why? I...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(But this is no dream. No, I'm here to<n>make my dreams
come true! That's<n>why... I have to run!)

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Okay, we're doing this. Ready, set...<n>GO!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff... huff... puff...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh! Good job keeping up, Spe!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But... you won't outrun me!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(She's fast! The pressure I felt<n>earlier... it's even more
intense now!)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
(Does... does her strength come from<n>the desire to realize
her dreams?)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Well... In that case!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: What the?! She completely closed the<n>lead I had!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Teiooo! I...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I came here to be the best<n>Umamusume in Japan!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: ...Oh yeah?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Well, guess what? You're not beating<n>me, Spe!

text_block_list.name: Teio and Special Week
text_block_list.text: AAAHHHHH! RAAAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Tracen Academy... is a place to make<n>dreams come true!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Of course... so that's it!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Well then... Do you get it now, Spe?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yes!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much for showing me<n>the best thing about
Tracen Academy,<n>Teio!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's nothing. Hehehe!
